ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Structural handling of identity numbers used in the Swedish administration such as personal identity numbers ('personnummer') and organizational identity numbers ('organisationsnummer').
Structural handling of identity numbers used in the Swedish administration such as personal identity numbers ('personnummer') and organizational identity numbers ('organisationsnummer').

name: r-sweidnumbr
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.5.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-sweidnumbr
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/sweidnumbr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/sweidnumbr/sweidnumbr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 174b6d0ffa43d08febebf2e8d7cf4eefed8e057bf479594e0b91f30b7932f870

build:
  number: 2
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-checkmate
    - r-lubridate >=1.5
    - r-stringr
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-checkmate
    - r-lubridate >=1.5
    - r-stringr

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('sweidnumbr')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('sweidnumbr')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/rOpenGov/sweidnumbr/
  license: BSD-2-Clause
  summary: Structural handling of identity numbers used in the Swedish administration such as personal identity numbers ('personnummer') and organizational identity numbers ('organisationsnummer').
  license_family: BSD
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/BSD_2_clause'
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: sweidnumbr
# Type: Package
# Title: Handling of Swedish Identity Numbers
# Version: 1.4.2
# Date: 2020-03-21
# Author: Mans Magnusson and Erik Bulow
# Maintainer: Mans Magnusson <mons.magnusson@gmail.com>
# Description: Structural handling of identity numbers used in the Swedish administration such as personal identity numbers ('personnummer') and organizational identity numbers ('organisationsnummer').
# VignetteBuilder: rmarkdown, knitr
# URL: https://github.com/rOpenGov/sweidnumbr/
# BugReports: https://github.com/rOpenGov/sweidnumbr/issues
# License: BSD_2_clause + file LICENSE
# Depends: R (>= 3.2)
# Encoding: UTF-8
# Imports: lubridate (>= 1.5), stringr, checkmate
# Suggests: testthat (>= 1.0.0), rmarkdown, knitr
# LazyData: true
# RoxygenNote: 7.0.1
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2020-03-29 15:25:03 UTC; mansmagnusson
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2020-03-29 15:50:02 UTC
